article: I'm Tony. I'm a student in a middle school. I'm glad to meet you here. First let me say something about my  _  . There're five people in  _  family, my mother, my father, my sister, my brother and I. My father is an  _  worker. My mother is a  _  . She teaches English. My sister is eighteen and my brother is sixteen. I'm fourteen. We  _  are in the same middle school. We all study hard. We live at the foot of West Hill. There's a big river near our  _  . Behind it there is a hill. There's a big tree and some small  _  around our house, the big tree is a pear tree and the small trees are apple trees,  _  there aren't any pears or apples on them.  _  a photo of my house. In the photo, you can see three cats are in my bedroom, one is white, and the other two are black and white. We like  _  very much.
